content.rendered:
Directed by Simarpreet Singh. Apoorv Singh Karki. Parijat Joshi

Written by Kunal Aneja. Abhishek Srivastava. Sidhant Mago. Ashutosh Chaturvedi. Pankaj Mavchi. Aakash Ahuja. Manan Madaan

Cast Apoorva Arora( Naira15 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Keshav Sadhna( Karan15 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Gagan Arora( Bagga15 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Shreya Mehta( Deepika15 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Manjot Singh( Trippy10 episodes, 2018-2021 ). Nupur Nagpal( Dhatrapriya7 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Ankur Pathak( Bhati6 episodes, 2021-2022 ). Hira Ashar( Raveena5 episodes, 2018 ). Eklavey Kashyap( Harry5 episodes, 2022 ). Jhanvi Rawat( Raavie / …4 episodes, 2022 ). Shiva Kumar( Munjal Sir4 episodes, 2018-2021 ). Ramandeep Yadav( Kukka4 episodes, 2022 ). Sanket Shanware( Makhi3 episodes, 2021 ). Ambrish Verma( Anshuman2 episodes, 2018 ). Ankit Motghare( Birju2 episodes, 2018 ). Tushangi Gupta( Kritika2 episodes, 2022 ). Darius Chinoy( Kabir1 episode, 2021 ). Aishwarya Chaudhary( Hippy1 episode, 2021 ). Samriddhi Mehra( Karishma1 episode, 2021 ). Sahil Verma( Bagga’s Friend1 episode, 2018 ). Surabhi Mehra( Raveena1 episode, 2021 ). Pawan Sabharwal( Poet1 episode, 2021 ). Kunal Aneja( Sagar1 episode, 2018 ). Shreya Singh( Anika1 episode, 2018 ). Puneet Waddan( Shantanu1 episode, 2021 ). Shivankit Singh Parihar( Pauranik Katha1 episode, 2021 ). Lokesh Mittal( Sir in Canteen1 episode, 2021 ). Kanikka Kapur( Priya1 episode, 2022 ). Silsila( Canteen Bhaiya1 episode, 2021 ). Aditya Singh( Chemist1 episode, 2021 ). Shilpi( Lady at Chemist Shop1 episode, 2021 ). Ashok Bhatia( Old Uncle at Chemist Shop1 episode, 2021 ). Gourav Swami( Jupiter1 episode, 2021 ). Kunal Singh( Bagga’s Friend1 episode, 2018 ). Tariq Khan(1 episode, 2018 ). Apoorv Singh Karki( A man in Canteen1 episode, 2021 ). Kumar Rahul( Manjot’s Friend1 episode, 2021 ). Annpurna Bemzi( Valentine Day Girl1 episode, 2021 ). K.P. Singh( Sandeep Bagga1 episode, 2021 ). Pankaj Sharma( Angry Man At Traffic Light1 episode, 2021 ). Shaan Rajput( Valentine Day Boy1 episode, 2021 ). Ayush Anand( Roommate 51 episode, 2022 ). Ushmita Bhola( Girlfriend1 episode, 2022 ). Harshvardhan Chaturvedi( Smoking Guy1 episode, 2022 ). Harsh Chaudhary( Roommate 41 episode, 2022 ). Rikzung Dorjee( Tattoo Artist1 episode, 2022 ). Himanshu Gahlawat( Roommate 11 episode, 2022 ). Kritik Malik( Roommate 61 episode, 2022 ). Nayan Manocha( Roommate 31 episode, 2022 ). Sami Ali Shah( Roommate 21 episode, 2022 ). Sarthak Sharma( Studious Guy1 episode, 2022 ). Akshay Tyagi( Boyfriend / …1 episode, 2022 )

Language Hindi

Producers Arun Kumar. Vijay Koshy. Arunabh Kumar. Shreyansh Pandey. Akansh Gaur. Puneet Waddan. Mohammad Sabir Ali. Richard Fernandes. Akshit Grover. Kumar Rahul. Himali Shah. Shivani Sinha

Production Contagious Online Media Network. The Timeliners.

Certificate 18+

Season 3

Episodes 5
